hero.title: GrowthX AI
hero.subtitle: Accelerate your growth with AI-powered marketing

features.title: AI-Powered Insights
features.description: Leverage cutting-edge AI to understand your customers better

features.title: Data-Driven Strategy

about.title: Who We Are
about.description: We help companies scale their marketing efforts with AI-powered solutions.

people.label: People
people.title: Exceptional talent. An extension of your team.
people.subtitle: Our forward-deployed expert network shapes strategy, builds agentic AI workflows, and ensures quality at scale.

process.label: Process
process.title: Quality earns trust. Scale and speed deliver growth.
process.subtitle: A proven process to accelerate time to the outcomes you care about: AI visibility, traffic, conversions.

steps.title: Inputs & Strategy
steps.description: We learn your business, audience, and competitive landscape fast. Then we identify the opportunities that will drive the most impact.

steps.title: Calibration & Workflows
steps.description: We define quality standards and voice together. Then we build custom AI workflows with human oversight that scale quality consistently.

steps.title: Execution & Iteration
steps.description: We publish and refresh content daily. Track AI visibility, rankings, traffic, and conversions. Iterate fast based on what's working.

steps.title: Growth & Scale
steps.description: Content compounds into consistent pipeline. The system gets smarter and faster. Experts shift toward strategy and new experiments.

cta.text: Ready to see this process at work and unlock your next stage of growth?

comparison.label: Comparison
comparison.title: How we're different.
comparison.subtitle: The best of AI efficiency and human expertise, without the tradeoffs.

fit.label: Fit
fit.title: Who we're built for.
fit.subtitle: GrowthX isn't for everyone. We work best with ambitious teams who understand that content is a competitive advantage worth investing in.

items.title: You're a growth-stage company ready to scale content.
items.description: You've moved past the early startup phase and are ready to invest in scalable content systems.

items.title: You have product-market fit and need to accelerate acquisition.
items.description: Your product works, customers love it, and now you need to reach more of them efficiently.

items.title: Your current content process is a bottleneck, not a growth lever.
items.description: You know content matters but your current approach can't keep up with your growth ambitions.

items.title: You value quality and are willing to invest in doing content right.
items.description: You understand that great content requires real investment and refuse to cut corners.

items.title: You want a partner, not just a vendor.
items.description: You're looking for a team that integrates with yours and cares about your success as much as you do.

footer.text: If this sounds like you, let's talk about how GrowthX can accelerate your content engine.

pricing.label: Pricing
pricing.title: Simple, transparent pricing.
pricing.subtitle: Choose the engagement model that fits your needs. Scale as you grow. All plans include a 30-day satisfaction guarantee. No long-term contracts required.

plans.name: We Drive → We Guide
plans.description: We handle everything, you provide direction

plans.name: Custom
plans.description: Forward-deployed engineers, fully embedded in your team

platformFeatures.heading: Go from 0 to everything you need

features.title: Day 1: Full Platform Access
features.description: Immediate access to the CheckThat platform. See data across 100,000+ of the most important industry prompts. Track up to 50 custom prompts for your brand. See which brands AI already favors in your category.

features.title: Day 2: The $1M AEO Research Study
features.description: The deepest research study we've run on what actually influences AI citations. Built from GrowthX learnings across real brands and categories. Covers what gets cited, what doesn't, and patterns that repeat across categories.

features.title: Day 3: Your Custom AEO Audit
features.description: A decisive, brand-specific audit focused on action. We show you what to fix, what to publish, and what to ignore. Get clear priorities for your AEO strategy.

features.title: Day 4: 2-Hour Content Workshop
features.description: A full workshop on building content that performs in AI systems. Led with content and frameworks from our partners in the ALG community. Get a repeatable content workflow and the framework for earning AI citations.

features.title: Day 5: Sneak Peek - AEO Masterclass
features.description: A preview of the cohorted masterclass and what "good" looks like when you're trying to win AI discovery. Covers what "good" looks like across research, content, and distribution, and the playbook outline we use to move from visibility data → action.

blogArticles.title: Building an AI-First Content Strategy for 2025
blogArticles.description: Learn how to leverage AI tools and frameworks to build a scalable content strategy that drives real business results in the age of generative AI.

blogArticles.title: How to Scale Content Production Without Sacrificing Quality
blogArticles.description: A practical guide to building content operations that can produce 10x more content while maintaining high editorial standards and brand consistency.

blogArticles.title: Implementing Growth Loops That Actually Work
blogArticles.description: Step-by-step framework for designing, building, and optimizing growth loops that compound over time and drive sustainable user acquisition.

blogArticles.title: 7 Data Signals That Prove You've Found Product-Market Fit
blogArticles.description: Beyond vanity metrics: the key indicators that show you've truly achieved product-market fit and are ready to scale your growth efforts.

blogArticles.title: SEO Strategy for the Age of ChatGPT and Perplexity
blogArticles.description: How search is evolving with AI assistants and what content creators need to do differently to maintain visibility and traffic in 2025.

blogArticles.title: A Data-Driven Framework for Conversion Rate Optimization
blogArticles.description: Move beyond A/B testing random changes. Learn the systematic approach top companies use to consistently improve conversion rates by 2-3x.

blogArticles.title: The Modern B2B Go-to-Market Playbook for 2025
blogArticles.description: Traditional B2B marketing is broken. Here's the new playbook that combines product-led growth, community, and AI-powered outreach.

blogArticles.title: Mastering Storytelling in 280 Characters or Less
blogArticles.description: How to craft compelling narratives that resonate with audiences in the age of Twitter, LinkedIn, and TikTok without sacrificing depth.

blogArticles.title: Multi-Touch Attribution: A Practical Implementation Guide
blogArticles.description: Stop guessing which channels drive conversions. Build an attribution model that actually helps you make better marketing investment decisions.

blogArticles.title: How to Design a SaaS Pricing Strategy That Maximizes LTV
blogArticles.description: The psychology and mathematics behind pricing that converts. Learn from real examples of companies that 3x'd revenue with pricing changes.

blogArticles.title: Measuring Real ROI from Video Content Marketing
blogArticles.description: Video is expensive. Here's how to track the metrics that matter and prove video content's impact on pipeline and revenue, not just views.

blogArticles.title: Building Email Automations That Feel Personal at Scale
blogArticles.description: The technical and creative playbook for email sequences that drive 40%+ open rates and consistently move users through your funnel.
